query:
UPDATE initiatives 
SET 
  problemStatement = 'Video production for destination marketing is expensive ($5K-$15K per video) and time-consuming (2-4 weeks from concept to final edit). Marketing team can only produce 12-15 videos per year due to budget and resource constraints. Competitors are producing 2-3 videos per month. Missing opportunities to showcase new destinations and seasonal offerings through video content.',
  aiApproach = 'Build custom AI video production platform that automatically generates promotional videos from destination photos, video clips, and templates using AI (similar to Synthesia or Pictory, but customized for travel content). Requires significant custom development: video processing infrastructure, AI model training, template library creation, and ongoing maintenance. High complexity and cost.',
  currentWorkflow = 'Traditional production: Hire videographer → film on location → professional editing → review cycles → final delivery. $8K average cost, 3 weeks timeline.',
  proposedWorkflow = 'AI-generated videos: Upload destination photos/clips → select template → AI generates video with music and transitions → marketer reviews/edits → export. Target: $500 cost, 2 days timeline.',
  bottlenecksAddressed = 'Reduces video production cost and time, enables higher video output frequency',
  processOwner = 'Video Marketing Manager',
  affectedTeams = '["Video Production", "Creative Team", "Digital Marketing", "IT/Development"]',
  primaryMetric = 'cost_reduction',
  quantifiedGoal = 'Reduce video production cost by 90% (from $8K to $500 per video) and increase output from 15 to 50 videos/year',
  baselineMeasurement = 'Current: $120K annual video budget, 15 videos/year, 3-week average production time',
  successCriteria = 'Achieve $500/video cost, 2-day turnaround, produce 50 videos/year, maintain quality standards',
  measurementMethod = 'Track per-video costs, production timelines, video engagement metrics (views, watch time)'
WHERE title = 'Custom AI Video Production Platform';
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user oYC4Lz5DqbQiGEf.root --database LVN2BBaghCkJZKnQ9H5R4v --execute UPDATE initiatives 
SET 
  problemStatement = 'Video production for destination marketing is expensive ($5K-$15K per video) and time-consuming (2-4 weeks from concept to final edit).
